thread.title: Former Catalan leader is detained in Germany

title: Former Catalan leader is detained in Germany
text:
Former Catalan leader is detained in Germany 7:44pm IST - 01:09 
Catalan leader Carles Puigdemont was detained on Sunday in Germany four months after he went into self-imposed exile from Spain, where he faces up to 25 years in prison for organizing an illegal referendum on secession last year.   
Catalan leader Carles Puigdemont was detained on Sunday in Germany four months after he went into self-imposed exile from Spain, where he faces up to 25 years in prison for organizing an illegal referendum on secession last year.  //reut.rs/2GqdLFt
